scripts.run-dev-android: NODE_ENV=dev npx cap sync android && NODE_ENV=dev npx cap run android
scripts.run-dev-ios: NODE_ENV=dev npx cap sync ios && NODE_ENV=dev npx cap run ios
scripts.buildrun-dev-android: npm run build-dev && npm run run-dev-android
scripts.buildrun-dev-ios: npm run build-dev && npm run run-dev-ios
scripts.run-prod-android: NODE_ENV=prod npx cap sync android && NODE_ENV=prod npx cap run android
scripts.run-prod-ios: NODE_ENV=prod npx cap sync ios && NODE_ENV=prod npx cap run ios
scripts.buildrun-prod-android: npm run build && npm run run-prod-android
scripts.buildrun-prod-ios: npm run build && npm run run-prod-ios
